about_the_game:
FIREFIGHT RELOADED is a brutal Half-Life 2 mod focused on massive swarms of enemies and fast-paced, movement oriented gameplay.

HALF-LIFE 2 GAMEPLAY: REDEFINED

Inspired by boomer shooters, Killing Floor, Titanfall, and Half-Life 2 mods like SMOD, FIREFIGHT RELOADED focuses on fast-paced, movement oriented gameplay. Run, shoot, grapple, slide, kick, and wallrun through ever-intensifying hordes of enemies and unlock new perks, weapons and items to become stronger. The mod also includes an in-game store that allows you to purchase items with with in-game currency acquired by killing enemies and playing the mod. Analyze every kill with the bullet time slow-motion feature that can be activated at any point. Utilize precisely-placed headshots and explosives to bring upon brutal annihilation of your enemies.

OLD AND NEW ARMAMENTS, OLD AND NEW ENEMIES

Fight in various locations from the Half-Life games and rip apart old, new and familiar foes with a sandbox of old, new and familiar weapons. Weapons have been modified with new firing modes and iron sights for those wishing for a more “tacticool” experience. They can be used in conjunction with movement options for powerful and brutal kills.

CUSTOMIZATION A-PLENTY!

Don’t like how FIREFIGHT RELOADED plays? You have full control over how enemies, weapons, and game mechanics behave with an ever-growing amount of options at your disposal. Find new maps, map information files, items for the in-game shop, loadouts, skins, gamemodes, NPCs and weapons on the Steam Workshop.

content_descriptors.notes: FIREFIGHT RELOADED, despite it being a Half-Life 2 modification, includes much more violence and gore than in the original game, including decapitations and dismemberment. These new effects can be disabled in the "ADVANCED OPTIONS" menu if you do not wish to see these.

detailed_description:
Just Updated

JUST UPDATED: NOW WITH ENDGAME

The ENDGAME update re-balances and re-tunes FIREFIGHT RELOADED. NPCs, weapons, and gameplay mechanics alike get a major overhaul with removals and additions that make the gameplay more streamlined and balanced. Subtle improvements made to the mod mean better compatibility with Hammer and other Source SDK tools. Experience ENDGAME natively on Linux or Steam Deck. This isn't the end, it's a start of a new beginning.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Debian Stable, Arch Linux, or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 OR AMD Athlon Processor (2.0 GHz or better)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: May severely lag on low-end PCs due to the amount of enemies on-screen. glibc 2.31+ required.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu, SteamOS (any version), Fedora or equivalent
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 OR AMD Ryzen 3 Processor (3.0 GHz or better)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with OpenGL support
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 14 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: glibc 2.31+ required.
